metadata.title: CVE-2022-0157 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: phoronix-test-suite is vulnerable to Improper Neutralization of InputDuring Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

criterions.comment: phoronix-test-suite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
